column5: I found this hilarious! FYI Mike Huckabee (SP?) is running for leadership of the Republican Party with hopes of one day becoming president  Talking to Americans - Capitol building is an igloo Video   G
We just made it look like that so the Snowbirds would feel more at home on their way down to Florida.
yeah, I watched it on his tv show  love watching his show
That was beautiful!!!!    You should send that over to Mitt Romney.

I'm so PROUD to be an American.     My fellow Americans never embarrass me!!    I would like to be the first non Canadian board  meember to say " Congradulations Canada on perserving your national Igloo " .
I liked the one where Rick was at Harvard University and had some professors swallow their proverbial foot!
My neighbours constructed a replica of our "National Igloo" last year in the backyard.....    Burt
Long live Prime Minister Poutine! Comforting to know them "leaders" are right up on things here in Canada
